credit_line: Gift of Dr. Robert Erwin Jones, Class of 1952
title: The Liberation of St. Peter (after Salvator Rosa)
medium: ink on paper mounted to board
inscriptions: l.l. in ink: A Sketch from Memory, of/ the picture painted by Salvator Rosa/ in the [illegible word - possession?] of the Earl of Chesterfield/ by B. West 1783; u.r. on mount in pencil: Lot 134; l.r. on mount in pencil: 7 <pounds> - 11 1/2 + 15 1/2
